channel.title: Comments on: Results of a unit long experiment in SBG and flipping.
channel.description: iteration, making, building, and coding in education

item.title: By: John Burk
item.dc:creator: John Burk
item.description: Evan, This is awesome. When you have some time, I'd also love to chat with you about your work on designing a problem database and see what insights you might have for our efforts to create a physics problem database.
item.content:encoded:
Evan,
This is awesome. When you have some time, I’d also love to chat with you about your work on designing a problem database and see what insights you might have for our efforts to create a physics problem database.
